TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.introduction: Welcome to Turkish Dictionary! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Turkish Dictionary if you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.p1: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. You are responsible for safeguarding the password that you use to access the service and for any activities or actions under your password.

userContent.title: User-Generated Content
userContent.p1: Our Service allows you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, or other material ('Content'), such as in the Feedback section. You are responsible for the Content that you post on or through the Service, including its legality, reliability, and appropriateness.
userContent.p2: By posting Content on or through the Service, you grant us the right and license to use, modify, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce, and distribute such Content on and through the Service. You retain any and all of your rights to any Content you submit.

licenseAndRestrictions.title: License and Restrictions
licenseAndRestrictions.p1: The source code for this website is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0. The content provided by the dictionary, unless otherwise stated, is for informational purposes.
licenseAndRestrictions.p2: You are expressly restricted from all of the following: publishing any website material in any media without prior written consent; using this website in any way that is, or may be, damaging to this website; using this website contrary to applicable laws and regulations.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.p1: This website is provided 'as is,' with all faults, and we make no express or implied representations or warranties of any kind related to this website or the materials contained on this website.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.p1: In no event shall Turkish Dictionary, nor any of its officers, directors, and employees, be liable to you for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this website, whether such liability is under contract, tort or otherwise.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
governingLaw.p1: These Terms will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Turkey, and you submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in Turkey for the resolution of any disputes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us via the feedback form.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how Turkish Dictionary collects, uses, and discloses your personal data in compliance with the Turkish Law on the Protection of Personal Data (KVKK) No. 6698.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.p1: The data controller for your personal data is Turkish Dictionary. You can contact us via the feedback system on the website.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.item1: Account Information: When you sign in using Google, Discord, or email, we collect your name, email address, and profile picture provided by the authentication service.
dataCollected.item2: User-Generated Content: We collect the information you provide when you submit feedback or feature requests, including the title, description, and any votes you cast.
dataCollected.item3: Usage Data: We may collect information on how the Service is accessed and used (e.g., search logs), which is processed anonymously or in aggregate.

purposeOfProcessing.title: Purpose of Data Processing
purposeOfProcessing.item1: To provide and maintain our Service.
purposeOfProcessing.item2: To manage your account and identify you as a user.
purposeOfProcessing.item3: To manage and prioritize community feedback.
purposeOfProcessing.item4: To communicate with you if necessary.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing with Third Parties
dataSharing.p1: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. Your data is not shared with any third party, except where required by law.

userRights.title: Your Rights Under KVKK
userRights.intro: As per Article 11 of the KVKK, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
userRights.item1: To learn whether your personal data is processed.
userRights.item2: To request information if your data has been processed.
userRights.item3: To learn the purpose of processing and whether they are used appropriately.
userRights.item4: To request correction of incomplete or inaccurate data.
userRights.item5: To request the deletion or destruction of your personal data under the conditions set forth in KVKK.
userRights.outro: You may exercise these rights by contacting us.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.p1: We take reasonable administrative and technical measures to protect your personal data from loss, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via the feedback form.

WordNotFound.title: Word Not Found
WordNotFound.description: This word is not in our dictionary yet. Help us improve by requesting it or adding detailed information.
WordNotFound.helpText: Quick request adds the word to our review queue. Detailed entry lets you contribute meanings, examples, and more.

ContributeWord.title: Contribute New Word
ContributeWord.description: Help expand our dictionary by contributing a detailed word entry. Your contribution will be reviewed by our team before being added.
ContributeWord.detailedTabDescription: Create a comprehensive word entry with meanings, examples, and attributes
ContributeWord.simpleTabDescription: Quickly request a word to be added to the dictionary
ContributeWord.submitNote: Your contribution will be reviewed by our team before being published. Thank you for helping improve our dictionary!
ContributeWord.requestSubmitted: Your word contribution has been submitted successfully! It will be reviewed by our team.
ContributeWord.requestFailed: Failed to submit your contribution. Please try again.
ContributeWord.captchaFailed: reCAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.
ContributeWord.wordAlreadyRequested: You have already requested this word. Please wait for admin review.

ContributeWord.relatedPhrasesDescription: Add phrases and idioms that are related to this word
ContributeWord.searchPlaceholder: Search for a word or phrase...

ContributeWord.noWordsFound: No words found matching your search

OfflineDictionary.title: Offline Dictionary
OfflineDictionary.description: Download the dictionary to your device to search for words even without an internet connection. This is ideal for learning on the go.

status.checking_desc: Checking the status of your offline dictionary.
status.update_available_desc: A new version of the dictionary is available. Local version: {local}, Server version: {remote}.
status.not_downloaded_desc: The offline dictionary has not been downloaded yet.
status.downloading_desc: Your offline dictionary is being downloaded.
status.deleting_desc: Your offline dictionary is being deleted.

error.metadata_fetch_failed: Could not fetch version information from the server.
error.no_metadata: Could not start download. Version information is missing.
error.r2_url_missing: Configuration error: The data source URL is not set.
